choices: I'll come up with something later
1.content: Well, we'll start off by choosing where you want to learn all your spells and such at. Sound good?
1.title: Ohh Dear. I guess we have to start this!

13.content: Hmmm, I guess we should learn more about you before you learn about magic. So here are a few options.
13.title: Japan

131.content: So your a 16 year old boy with a strong affinity to Lightning? How about we call you Bolt? No? Too cheesy for ya? Fine. Telum it is than. Your a transfer student from the United States here on a one for one trade with the Japaneses branch. Your goal is to show friendship and kindness to your fellow students.......or whatever you want to do.
131.title: Lightnings nice. Right?

info.brief_description: Mas-Mystical Academy of Sorcery. And your the new student.
info.description:
Your the new Student at the MAS, which is a group of magic users who run a school!
You can choose whatever powers you want but i do ask that you don't over power your character.
Everyone can know the basics of certain spells like firebolt and the like, but each person can have a spell or group of spells they are more intoned with. Such as someone having a great ability with water magic but still knowing how to use lower level earth magic.
There are currently 3 branches of the MAS; located in England, the United States, and also Japan. Where your character goes is up to you.

Please leave a review, and before you leave a bad one realize this is my first attempt at a story.
